name: Soul Cake Bakery
description:
Soul Cake Bakery is a MOBILE GAME made in 48H for a GameJam.  Help your cute customers in need of sugar and mental health support!

______________

The team was composed of 5 people :

  •  Marion Oudin (Producer & Storyteller)  https://www.linkedin.com/in/marion-oudin-38947880/
  • Cristina Martin (3D /animations)  https://twitter.com/cmartin3d
  • Alexandre Nguyen  & Jan Jongejeugd Serrat  (Devs)
  •  Cheapcookiez (2D concepts/UI)  https://twitter.com/Cheapcookiez
the Taramousse team hopes you will have fun!
